overview: We sent our gang of buff young things off to the country to help out with the construction of a house – and what do we discover? Seems like they’re just as horny out on the building-site as they are in the studio; and needless to say work on the house didn’t go quite as smoothly as we hoped. Not that our legion of horned-up fans will be complaining, as these handsome, ball-busting, cock-straining fuckers – Bjorn Nykvist, Milan Sharp and David Hollister among them – abandon their shovels to stretch ass and spew copious amounts of hot cum!
title: Bare Buff Builders
